mapper.select: select count(notice_no) from pn_notice where passive = #{attribute} and read = 'n'

select * from (select distinct n.*, case n.n_type when 'renut' then p.content when 'reply' then r.content else null end n_content , m1.m_nickname active_nn, m1.m_profile active_pf from pn_notice n, pn_peanuts p, pn_replies r, pn_member m1 where n.peanut_no = p.renut(+) and n.active = m1.m_id and n.reply_no = r.reply_no(+) and n.passive = #{m_id} order by n.notice_no desc) where rownum <= 100
mapper.update: update pn_notice set read = 'y' where passive = #{m_id}
